name: ANGKATA
description:
Angkata is a two-player cooperative adventure, the game offers a story to be discovered by actively cooperating with another person by sharing the same controller and cooperating within the game world, drawing its aesthetic from the iconography of comic book culture.

Players will step into the shoes of the Guardians, two souls bound at death who will have to help and cooperate in order to leave the plane they are on and reach the afterlife.

The guardians are in a plane of existence of transition between material life and life in the spiritual world, these souls have been linked during the moment of their death and now they need to cooperate to reach the heart of the temple, where the door to the afterlife is located. The temple is infected by a corruption that players must remove from the path to continue and in the same way they will use their spiritual power to create life and generate roots that serve as bridges to areas of difficult access.

IT IS NECESSARY TO USE A CONTROLLER TO BE ABLE TO PLAY THE GAME

(Dualshock4 by the moment)
